Content.Text:
<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
<MYNAME>, wake up! Something terrible has
happened!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Jonas has just informed me that
<MOJI0> has died.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
According to him, the cause appears to be old
age.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
It looks like you didn't take very good care of the
poor thing. That doesn't reflect well upon you.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's obvious you took very good care of it. You
should be proud of yourself.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm certain <MOJI0> understood
how much you cared, and is grateful for
everything you gave.
<PAGE>
<MOJI0> was probably very glad
it had the chance to live on your farm.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
We will bury it in our animal graveyard outside of
town, so that it may rest in peace.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Let's observe a minute's silence for poor
<MOJI0>.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Now, then, if you'll excuse me...

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, in respect for
<MOJI0>'s life, I hope you
continue to take loving care of your animals.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
...I think it's time for us to go back now.
